entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 02:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: S 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
